description.raw:
The \`ign-math6\` nightly build is failing due to a problem with a test that needs software installation to run. That is not possible in debian since the install step goes after the test step. I’m removing the test here for the debian build.

**Failing:**

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign-math6-debbuilder&build=224)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math6-debbuilder/224/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math6-debbuilder/224/))

**Changes:**

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign-math6-debbuilder&build=226)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math6-debbuilder/226/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign-math6-debbuilder/226/))

‌
